title: SHIP Medicare-Only: Plan-Specific Questions (Example with Plan Information)
description: Example scenario demonstrating plan information feature. Contains questions 7-14 which ask about specific Medicare Advantage plan details. Shows how plan_information field is used for question substitution and answer verification while maintaining SHIP study fidelity.
source: Dugan K et al. JAMA Network Open. 2025;8(4):e252834 - eAppendix 1

persona.current_coverage: Employer-based health coverage with prescription drug coverage
persona.situation: Turning 65 in 2 months, just becoming eligible for Medicare. Takes Lipitor 10mg daily for cholesterol.

opening_statement: I am turning 65 soon and will be eligible for Medicare. I would like help choosing my coverage. Can you help?

scripted_turns.user_message: Is [plan name] available where I live?
scripted_turns.note: Plan name will be substituted with 'Humana Gold Plus HMO'

scripted_turns.user_message: What is the monthly premium for [plan name]?
Would [plan name] let me go out of network?
What is the copay for a primary care doctor visit for [plan name]?
What is the copay to see a specialist for [plan name]?
For [plan name], is there a limit on out-of-pocket costs I would have to pay each year?
Does [plan name] include prescription drug coverage?
